data.comment: The first-half is under way at Oakwell Ground - Preston kick-off to start the match.
Preston move into a 0-1 lead through a Sean Maguire header.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Barnsley with the kick-off.
Alex Mowatt levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 61, Valerien Ismael is making the team's first substitution at Oakwell Ground with Victor Adeboyejo replacing Dominik Frieser.
Luke Thomas is on a sub for Conor Chaplin for Barnsley.
Preston's Alan Browne has been booked in Barnsley.
In the minute 67, Joe Rafferty is replacing Sean Maguire for Preston at Oakwell Ground.
Preston make their second substitution with Scott Sinclair replacing Emil Riis Jakobsen.
Daniel Johnson (Preston) has received a yellow card from Dean Whitestone.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Tom Barkhuizen with Jayden Stockley. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Neil.
The home team replace Matty James with Herbie Kane.
Alex Neil (Preston) is making a fourth substitution, with Tom Bayliss replacing Paul Gallagher.
In the minute 80, Goal! Victor Adeboyejo gives Barnsley a 2-1 lead in Barnsley.
Callum Styles (Barnsley) gets a yellow card.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
At Oakwell Ground, Luke Thomas has been yellow-carded for the home team.
